author: tylercase
title: Cardano Caravan for Advisors
description: Building Cardano's brand recognition requires marketing and education to all stakeholders in the physical and digital worlds.
solution: Create a Catalyst Community Advisor caravan to educate and increase the awareness of Cardano.
experience: 1,472 followers, Hosted 150+ Twitter spaces, 8 to 10 hours a day in Cardano's CNFT Community, Onboarded  new users, Community Advisor
